data.text: R1# show access-lists Standard IP access list NO_ACCESS 10 deny 192.168.11.10 20 permit 192.168.11.0, wildcard bits 0.0.0.255 R1# conf t Enter configuration commands, one per line. End with CNTL/Z. R1(config)# ip access-list standard NO_ACCESS R1(config-std-nacl)# 15 deny host 192.168.11.11 R1(config-std-nacl)# end R1# show access-lists Standard IP access list NO_ACCESS 10 deny 192.168.11.10 15 deny 192.168.11.11 20 permit 192.168.11.0, wildcard bits 0.0.0.255 R1#
